description: Elections Commission - E. M. D. B. Ekanayaka of the Polgahawela Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna - W. A. K. Wagalath and H. C. Herath of the Polgahawela Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna
